subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Daniel Paille swept in a loose puck that Henrik Lundqvist did not see with 3 minutes 31 seconds left, giving Boston a victory and a 3-0 lead in their Eastern Conference semifinal.
snippet: Daniel Paille swept in a loose puck that Henrik Lundqvist did not see with 3 minutes 31 seconds left, giving Boston a victory and a 3-0 lead in their Eastern Conference semifinal.
